mapper.select: SELECT d.dept_code AS deptCode, d.dept_name AS deptName, d.parent_dept_code AS parentDeptCode, d.emp_id AS empId, d.created_date AS createdDate, d.com_id AS comId, d.acct_yn AS acctYn, d.remark, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees e WHERE e.dept_code = d.dept_code ) AS empCount FROM departments d ORDER BY d.dept_code
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM departments WHERE dept_code = #{deptCode} AND com_id = #{comId}
